caption:
"A glossy ceramic mug with white coloring and a rounded shape. Has a comfortable handle and flat base. Made for holding hot drinks. Sitting beside a coffee maker and jar of beans on a kitchen counter."

"A possibly fabric oven mitt-type object with dark coloration and rectangular shape. Appears to have padded insulation and textured grip surface. Likely used for handling hot cookware. Found hanging near an oven in a kitchen setting."

"Inconclusive evidence for the category of the object in the green bounding box. It appears to be a metallic tool-type object, matte silver with angular grooves. Ambiguous function between wrench or specialized clamp. Seen in workshop environment near assembly parts."
